title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and admin dashboard.

title: Weather App
description: A real-time weather application using OpenWeather API. Displays current weather, 5-day forecast, and allows location search with a beautiful responsive UI.

title: Task Management System
description: A collaborative task management application with user authentication, real-time updates, and team collaboration features using Firebase.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard displaying social media metrics from multiple platforms. Built with React, Redux, and Chart.js for data visualization.

title: Blog Platform
description: A blogging platform with markdown support, user authentication, comments, and search functionality. Backend built with Express and PostgreSQL.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This portfolio website! Showcasing projects, skills, and experience with responsive design and smooth animations.
